passive_1: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them summons a nova at their location, healing allied champions within the area for 100 (+ 20% AP) (60 second cooldown).

Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them summons a nova at their location, healing allied champions within the area for 100 (+ 25% AP) (60 second cooldown).

Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them summons a nova at their location, healing allied champions within the area for 50 (+ 50% AP) (60 second cooldown).
